attributes.action: Call for Sir Michael Wilshaw to resign as Ofsted chief
attributes.additional_details:
Since taking office in early 2012, Sir Michael has caused massive damage to the moral of schoolteachers. His constant negative rhetoric sends completely the wrong message.
His recent statements about teachers not knowing what stress is and about banning mobile phones in schools shows he is out of touch with the workforce. For the good of education he must be removed from office.
